explanation: [0-0] A soccer player in a white jersey is chasing a soccer ball, followed by a player in a yellow jersey. In the middle of the frame, there is a soccer ball suspended in midair. The soccer field is covered with green grass, the fence in the background is blue, and the stands are filled with spectators. There is a white watermark in the upper right corner.

[0-8] The camera pans, and the soccer ball arrives at the feet of a goalkeeper in a green jersey. Several other players can be seen running on the field. A player in a yellow jersey tries to steal the ball, but the goalkeeper in green hooks it back with his foot, then supports himself with his hand on the ground, turns around and continues to dribble.
